description: The BMW Z4’s retirement has become official with the recently introduced Final Edition. The package focuses on design touches such as Frozen Black paint, shadowline accents, and a tidier interior finish. It makes for a clean and low-volume collectible, though it does not change the way the Z4 ...

descriptionSummary: The BMW Z4 has reached the end of its road with the release of the Final Edition model, which emphasizes sleek design elements like a unique paint job and refined interior details to create a rare and stylish collector's item.

title: The Forgotten Subaru Concept That Became the Forester
description: Japan has been in the SUV game long before the term SUV was even coined. Prior to that, they were called RVs or recreational vehicles over there, and totally unrelated to the American definition of RV. titleSummary: "Subaru's Unsung Hero: How a Forgotten Design Led to the Iconic Forester"
descriptionSummary: Japan has a rich history of producing rugged vehicles that predate the modern SUV concept. Dubbed "RVs" or recreational vehicles in the past, these off-roaders gained popularity by the 1980s, with iconic models like the Mitsubishi Pajero leading the charge.

description: While some of us collect Tomica die-cast cars, others take the idea much further. title: Plug-In Hybrids Now Outsell Diesel in Europe

descriptionSummary: In a significant milestone, plug-in hybrid vehicles have surpassed diesel cars in European new-car registrations for the first time ever, signaling a major turning point in one of the world's largest automotive markets.

description: Americans heading out for Thanksgiving celebrations found a welcome surprise at the pump this year. descriptionSummary: California took steps to boost driver's licenses with enhanced security features recently, while Texas overhauled its vehicle registration system, introducing stricter requirements that effectively bar undocumented citizens from obtaining vehicle registrations.

title: Crash Test Dummies Were Male for 50 Years, And Women Paid the Price
description: Research shows that women are 73% more likely to be seriously injured in head-on car crashes compared with men in the same crashes. title: Auto Loan Delinquencies Are Way Up, Making It Harder To Get A Loan
description: Auto loans are a good way to gauge the health of an economy. When the economy is healthy, interest rates are low, and borrowing remains strong. titleSummary: "Borrowers Struggle to Repay Car Loans as Defaults Soar and Credit Tightens"
descriptionSummary: A nation's economic vitality can be measured through its auto lending trends. Low interest rates and high borrowing indicate a thriving economy, while rising delinquencies signal underlying problems. The current rate plateau suggests economic woes.
